title: ADD_TEXT_COMPONENT_SUBSTRING_PLAYER_NAME
content:
0x6C188BE134E074AA0x27A244D8// AddTextComponentSubstringPlayerName
void ADD_TEXT_COMPONENT_SUBSTRING_PLAYER_NAME(char* text);Parameters:text: A string to add of up to 99 characters. This can contain additional ~ formatting directives.Adds an arbitrary string as a text component placeholder, replacing ~a~ in the current text command's text label.See the documentation on text formatting for more information.Old name:  _ADD_TEXT_COMPONENT_STRINGExamples:Lua-- on initialization
AddTextEntry('TEST_LABEL', 'Label: ~a~')

-- when drawing
BeginTextCommandDisplayText('TEST_LABEL')
AddTextComponentSubstringPlayerName('Hello, World!')
EndTextCommandDisplayText(0.5, 0.5)
